term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - mixed crystal (solid solution)
term.title: mixed crystal

item.text: A crystal containing a second constituent which fits into and is distributed in the lattice of the host crystal. (The use of 'solid solution' for amorphous materials is not recommended.)
